overview: What was it like to lose your eyesight at 41? Albert Rizzi, a teacher and life long New Yorker gives us his intense retelling of the experience and what it's like to live it today. Through recreations, opinions, and outings the film catalogs the struggles and beauty of blindness; one in which it doesn't necessarily mark an end. So follow Albert's intimacy and let it take you on a short foray into the life of one hell of a brave man.
title: Albert
